text: الم تروا۟ كيف خلق الله سبع سموت طباقا

translations.translation: Do you not see how He created seven heavens in layers,
Do you not see how God has fashioned seven skies one above the other,
Do you not see how Allah has created seven heavens, one upon the other,
Have you not seen that God has created the seven heavens one above the other
‘Do you not see how Allah has created the seven heavens atop each other?’
See you not how Allah has created the seven heavens in tiers
Do you not see how Allah has created the seven heavens, one above another,
Have you not regarded how God created seven heavens one upon another,
See ye not how Allah hath created seven heavens in harmony,
Do you not see how God has created the seven heavens one above another,
Behold ye not in what wise Allah hath created seven heavens in storeys.
Have you not seen how Allah has created the seven heavens in layers,
See ye not how Allah has created the seven heavens one above another,
See you not how Allah has created the seven heavens one above another,
Have you not seen how Allah created the seven heavens one above the other,
Do you not realize that God created seven heavens in layers?
Do you not consider how Allah has created seven heavens in layers
[71:15] Have you not seen how God created seven heavens in layers, one on top of the other,

(See ye not) have you not been informed, disbelievers of Mecca, (how Allah hath created seven heavens in harmony) He created them one above the other like a dome whose different parts are cemented with each other,

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text:
{ أَلَمْ تَرَوْاْ } أيها الراءون المعتبرون { كَيْفَ خَلَقَ ٱللَّهُ } بقدرته الكاملة { سَبْعَ سَمَٰوَٰتٍ طِبَاقاً } [نوح: 15] مطبقات بعضها في جوف بعض إلى حيث ينتهي الكل إلى كرة واحدة وقعت مظهراً للوحدة الذاتية
 وإن كان كل ذرة من ذرائر الكائنات المستقلة في مظهرية الوحدة الذاتية؟!

commentaries.author: ابن عجيبة
commentaries.text:
يقول الحق جلّ جلاله: { ألم تَرَوْا كيف خلق اللهُ سبعَ سمواتٍ طباقاً } أي: متطابقة بعضها فوق بعض
 والرؤية هنا علمية إذ لا يُرى بالبصر إلاَّ واحدة
 وعُلِّقت بالاستفهام
 وعلمهم بذلك من جهة الوحي السابق
 أو كانوا منجّمين
